S3.T1.1.table:
Col. name Description
dataset Name of the original annotated dataset.
origin Summarization dataset. Either cnndm or xsum.
id Document id.
doc Input article.
summary Model generated summary.
model name Name of the model used to generate the summary.
label Factual consistency of the generated summary. 1 is factually consistent, 0 otherwise.
cut Either val or test.
system score The output score from a factuality system.
system label The binary factual consistency label based on the score of the factuality system. Only examples in the test set have labels. Labels are determined under the threshold-per-dataset setting.

doc France’s Dubuisson carded a 67 to tie with overnight leader Van Zyl of South Africa on 16 under par. McIlroy carded a third straight five under-par 67 to move to 15 under par with Thailand’s Kiradech Aphibarnrat. The world number three’s round included an eagle on the 12th as he bids to win his first title since May. "The 67s I’ve shot this week have all been a little different and I feel like I’ve played within myself for all of them, " said four-time major winner McIlroy of Northern Ireland.
